text: Jean Graton (10 August 1923 – 21 January 2021) was a French comic book author and cartoonist. Graton created the famous character Michel Vaillant and his comics series of the same name in 1957. Graton was born in Nantes, France. On 21 January 2021, Graton died in Brussels, Belgium, at the age of 97.Décès de Jean Graton, créateur de Michel Vaillant et dernier monstre sacré de l’âge d’or de la BD franco-belge ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French cartoonists Category:Comics writers Category:French comics artists Category:People from Nantes Category:Writers from Pays de la Loire
title: Jean Graton
